languages.english-overview:
Monsta FTP is an open source (free to use) web-based file manager for your website or server that connects you via FTP to to any remote server, so you can upload, download and edit files from your browser.
Monsta FTP is released under the GNU General Public License.

ul.li: Connect to any remote FTP server from your browser (via client server)
Drop files from your desktop onto browser to upload in real-time
Drop folders (in Chrome browser) from your desktop onto browser to upload files
Download files from remote servers to your desktop
Zip up multiple files and download to your desktop
Fetch files from URLs and download directly to remote server
Cut, copy, paste and rename folders and files
